context.p: This procedure shows how to break up a longer procedure with a set of substeps.

step.cmd: From the Windows Start menu, open the WSE Configuration tool.
Open the wse3policyCache.config file for the Enqueue project (..\C#\SimpleQueueService\Enqueue\).
On the General tab, select Enable this project for Web Services Enhancements.
If you haven’t signed in, follow the prompts to log in.
Click the Policy tab to create a new policy:

substep.cmd: Under Edit Application Policy, click Add to specify the policy to enable.
substep.stepresult: The Add or Modify Policy Friendly Name dialog box opens.

substep.cmd: In the Add or Modify Policy Friendly Name dialog box, type a name for the name of the policy, and then click OK.
substep.stepresult: The WSE Security Settings Wizard is displayed.

substep.cmd: Follow the instructions in the wizard to create your new policy.
